daemon_error.message: Please check the WSRX software log and report the issue.
daemon_error.title: WSRX daemon error

daemon_offline.message: The WSRX daemon is offline. Please check if the WSRX daemon is running.
daemon_offline.title: WSRX daemon sedang offline

daemon_unavailable.message: WSRX daemon sedang tidak berjalan. Jika klien sudah berjalan, coba cek apakah WSRX kontrol address di platform sudah di seting dengan benar.
daemon_unavailable.title: WSRX daemon unavailable

error.unknown: An unknown error occurred while calling the WSRX API.

version_mismatch.message: WSRX version is too low, please update to the latest version before using platform integration.
version_mismatch.title: Version mismatch
